casebody.data:
Tony WILLIS, Petitioner-Appellant, v. J. J. CLARK, Warden, et al., Respondent-Appellee. No. 71-1941

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Nov. 30, 1971. Tony Willis, pro se. John W. Stokes, Jr., U. S. Atty., Charles A. Panned, Jr., Atlanta, Ga., for respondent-appellee.

Before BELL, AINSWORTH and GODBOLD, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5 Cir., Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Company of New York et al., 5 Cir., 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.*

See N.L.R.B. v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5 Cir., 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
